algorithm: The new algorithm, named Modified Exponential Score Algorithm, calculates the scores as the exponential ratio of two components: the item size and the rest capacity of the bins.
code:
import numpy as np

def score(item: int, bins: np.ndarray) -> np.ndarray:
    """The Modified Exponential Score Algorithm calculates the scores as the exponential ratio of the item size and the rest capacity of the bins."""
    
    max_capacity = np.max(bins)
    
    # Calculate the item size component as the item size divided by the maximum capacity of the bins
    item_size_component = item / max_capacity
    
    # Calculate the rest capacity component as the rest capacity of the bins divided by the maximum capacity of the bins
    rest_capacity_component = bins / max_capacity
    
    # Calculate the scores as the exponential ratio of the item size component and the rest capacity component
    scores = np.exp(item_size_component / rest_capacity_component)
    
    return scores
